steps.314: add-add 1/2 tbsp softened butter to the bowl
steps.315: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
steps.316: Add-Add 1/3 cup cheddar cheese to a microwave-safe cup
steps.317: Mix-Mix the cheese and red bell pepper in the bowl
steps.318: Microwave-Microwave the bowl, covered, for 2 minutes
steps.319: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper to the bowl
steps.320: Add-Add 1 tablespoons of water to the bowl
steps.321: Chop-Chop 1/4 red bell pepper into tiny bits
steps.322: Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl
steps.323: Melt-Melt the cheese by microwaving cup for 30 sec. (Check after 30 seconds and microwave for 10 seconds more if needed)
steps.324: Mix-Mix all the ingredients of the bowl well
